code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./formCliente.css';import{X}from"phosphor-react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(X,{onClick:()=>ocultarForm(),size:20})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:manejarEnvio,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"inputbox",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Nombre:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:nombre,onChange:e=>setNombre(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"inputbox",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Descripci\xF3n:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:descripcion,onChange:e=>setDescripcion(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"inputbox",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Celular:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:telefono,onChange:e=>setTelefono(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{id:"btnN",className:"inputbox",type:"submit",children:"Crear
